TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebPart

summary.span: 定义由 ASP.NET 控件使用的公共用户界面 (UI) 属性。

span.span: Defines common user interface (UI) properties used by ASP.NET controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供了多个面向 UI 的属性可增强用户体验的使用控件。The interface provides several UI-oriented properties that enhance the user experience of working with controls. 当创建派生自基控件类，您获取中的所有属性的实现接口，因为基类实现此接口。When you create controls that derive from the base class, you get an implementation of all the properties in the interface, because the base class implements this interface. 您可以使用现有的用户控件、 ASP.NET 控件或不是继承的自定义服务器控件类作为一部分的 Web 部件应用程序，他们还可以使用来声明这些面向 UI 的属性和接口。You can use existing user controls, ASP.NET controls, or custom server controls that do not inherit from the class as part of a Web Parts application, and they can also use these UI-oriented properties declared by the interface. 如果将放置在现有服务器控件区域，在运行时与它们的包装对象。If you place existing server controls in a zone, at run time they are wrapped with a object. 因为类继承自基类，它使现有的服务器控件能够处理为 true，则控件并已将添加到它们的属性接口。Because the class inherits from the base class, it enables existing server controls to act as true controls and it adds to them the properties of the interface. 如果将服务器控件不区域中的控件，它们可以使用属性在运行的时，并且您还可以声明这些属性的值 （以页持久性格式） 页的标记中的服务器控件上。If you place server controls that are not controls in zones, they can use the properties at run time, and you can also declare values for those properties on server controls in the markup of the page (in page persistence format). 但是，因为在运行时，这些属性是仅提供给服务器控件，设计时间用于编码功能，如 IntelliSense 不能识别服务器控件声明的属性。However, because these properties are only available to the server controls at run time, design-time coding features such as IntelliSense do not recognize properties that are declared on server controls. 这些控件上的声明的属性仍正常工作时加载的页面，但 Microsoft Visual Studio 无法识别属性为有效在设计时。Declared properties on these controls still work when you load the page, but Microsoft Visual Studio does not recognize the properties as valid at design time. 如果你想要添加现有的服务器和用户控件来增强的设计时用户体验的属性，可以实现服务器控件中的接口。If you want to add the properties to existing server and user controls to enhance the design-time user experience, you can implement the interface in a server control. 可能是实现的主要原因接口是不支持使用 expando （自定义） 属性的控件。Perhaps the main reason to implement the interface is for controls that do not support the use of expando (custom) properties. Expando 属性是字符串，可以添加到类动态属性，通过接口。Expando properties are strings that can be added to a class dynamically as a property, by means of the interface. 实现此接口的控件包括类及其子项中，可以使用 expando 属性。Controls that implement this interface, including the class and its children, can use expando properties. 因此，所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件、 自定义控件都派生自这些 Web 用户控件和控件支持 expando 属性的用法。Therefore, all ASP.NET server controls, custom controls that derive from them, Web user controls, and controls support the use of expando properties. 直接从基类继承的但自定义控件类不支持 expando 属性。But custom controls that inherit directly from the base class do not support expando properties. 因此，如果声明中的这些控件，你将不能声明通用属性上的控件属性，如和。Thus, if you declare these controls within a , you will not be able to declare the common properties on the controls, properties such as and . 如果你想要使用这些属性与这些控件，则必须实现接口。If you want to use these properties with such controls, you must implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现用户控件中的接口。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface in a user control. 这是按最小方式演示如何实现属性的简单实现。This is a simple implementation that shows minimally how to implement the properties. 代码示例的第一部分显示了用户控件。The first part of the code example shows the user control. 用户控件实现的所有属性接口，以及另外两个公共属性绑定到控件中的用户界面。The user control implements all the properties of the interface, plus two additional public properties tied to controls in the user interface. 两个自定义属性都使用`Personalizable`属性，使跨浏览器会话保存这些属性中的值。The two custom properties each use the `Personalizable` attribute, which enables the values in those properties to be saved across browser sessions. 请注意，在基类的实现; 的所有属性接口实现为可个性化，但它们不在此代码示例。Note that in the base class implementation, all the properties of the interface are implemented as personalizable as well, though they are not in this code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#2)] 代码示例的第二部分显示了承载用户控件的网页。The second part of the code example shows the Web page that hosts the user control. 页具有控件，该用户控件引用。The page has a control, within which the user control is referenced. 请注意，多个接口的属性值用户控制，使其行为和外观类似于在标记中以声明方式设置控制在设计时和运行时。Notice that several of the interface's property values are set declaratively in the markup for the user control, which enables it to both behave and appear similar to a control at design time and run time. 如果在浏览器页面加载时，可用于 UI 页面上演示的功能以编程方式更改的实现值属性在运行时。If you load the page in a browser, you can use the UI on the page to demonstrate the ability to programmatically change the values of the implemented properties at run time. 某些属性值更改时，所做的更改不可见的页面上，但是会显示在页面源文件 (属性)，或在应用程序的状态数据存储 (属性)。When you change some of the property values, the changes are not evident on the page, but are visible in the page source (the property), or are stored in the application's state data (the property). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountuchostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountuchostvb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 通常情况下不需要实现接口，或者在自定义控件或服务器控件，因为基类已经实现了接口。自定义控件，并放置在其他服务器控件区域，可以使用所有属性。若要实现的主要原因接口，无论是在自定义控件或其他服务器控件，是你想要更改的默认实现。例如，你可能想要提供的某些属性的默认值。实现接口中的用户或服务器控件的另一个原因是，以便使用这些属性在控件上的设计时体验将得到加强。

Normally you do not need to implement the interface, either on custom controls or server controls, because the base class already implements the interface. Custom controls, and other server controls that are placed in zones, can use all the properties. The main reason to implement the interface yourself, whether in a custom control or another server control, is if you want to change the default implementation. For example, you might want to provide default values for some of the properties. Another reason to implement the interface in a user or server control is so that the design-time experience of working with these properties on the control will be enhanced.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CatalogIconImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CatalogIconImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的 URL，该图像在控件目录中表示一个 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a control in a catalog of controls.

value.span: 表示图像的 URL 的字符串，该图像用于在目录中表示控件。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in a catalog.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件应用程序通常提供的用户可以添加到页面的控件的一个目录 （或列表）。Web Parts applications often provide a catalog (or list) of controls that users can add to a page. 控件上的属性包含在目录中出现时表示控件的图像的 URL。The property on a control contains the URL to an image that represents the control when it appears in a catalog. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码类概述。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现用户控件属性。The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#8)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#8)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式设置的值的用户控件中的方法当用户从单选按钮的页上，选择相应的属性名称的属性中的文本框中，设置新值和然后单击**更新**按钮。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#9)] 代码示例的第三部分显示了用户如何控制实现中引用接口控件，以及如何在控件上以声明方式设置属性。The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the interface is referenced in a control, and how the property is set declaratively on the control. 请注意，由于没有与此示例中提供的 Web 部件控件没有目录，不能看到设置此属性的实际效果。Note that because there is no catalog of Web Parts controls provided with this example, you cannot see the actual effect of setting this property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountuchostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountuchostvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一条短语，该短语在 控件的工具提示和目录中用来概述该控件的作用。

span.span: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what a control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of controls.

value.span: 字符串，简要概述控件的功能。

span.span: A string that briefly summarizes the control's functionality.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值通常用作提供的列表的目录中的控件的描述性字符串控件，并为工具提示控件的标题栏中。The property value is typically used as a descriptive string for a control in catalogs that provide lists of controls, and as a ToolTip in a control's title bar. 该属性的内容的用户将鼠标指针定位控件的标题栏中的标题文本上时显示工具提示中。The content of the property appears in a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title text in a control's title bar. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码类概述。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现用户控件属性。The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#3)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式设置的值的用户控件中的方法当用户从单选按钮的页上，选择相应的属性名称的属性中的文本框中，设置新值和然后单击**更新**按钮。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#9)] 代码示例的第三部分显示了用户如何控制实现中引用接口控件，以及如何在控件上以声明方式设置属性。The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the interface is referenced in a control, and how the property is set declaratively on the control. 请注意，您可以通过将鼠标指针置于控件的标题栏中的标题文本后已加载页在浏览器中看到此属性的值。Note that you can see the value of this property by positioning your mouse pointer over the title text in the control's title bar, after you have loaded the page in a browser. 您还可以尝试更改的属性值以编程方式在运行时加载 Web 页，然后使用提供的用户界面 (UI) 更改的属性值。You can also experiment with changing the property value programmatically at run time by loading the Web page and using the provided user interface (UI) to change the property value. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountuchostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountuchostvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Subtitle As String
public: property System::String ^ Subtitle { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串与 属性值连接即形成 控件的完整标题。

span.span: Gets a string that is concatenated with the property value to form a complete title for a control.

value.span: 作为控件副标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that serves as a subtitle for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于返回的默认副标题字符串追加到标题栏中的控件的标题的控件。The property is used to return a default subtitle string for a control that is appended to the control's title in the title bar. 如果提供的默认值实现的控件中的属性接口，Web 部件控件集自动将其追加到的值在运行时控件的属性。If you provide a default value for the property in a control that implements the interface, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the property of the control at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码类概述。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现用户控件属性。The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the property. 请注意，该属性是只读的旨在用于提供默认副标题追加到主控件的标题。Note that the property is read-only and is meant to be used to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the main title of a control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#5)] 代码示例的第二部分显示了用户如何控制实现中引用接口控件，以及如何从可写属性在控件上以声明方式设置。The second part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the interface is referenced in a control, and how the writable properties from are set declaratively on the control. 加载浏览器中的页面后，请注意，默认值的属性，用于设置用户控件的实现代码中，追加到控件的标题栏中的标题。After you load the page in a browser, note that the default value of the property, which was set in the user control's implementation code, is appended to the title in the control's title bar. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountuchostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountuchostvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of a control.

value.span: 包含控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the title of the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置控件的标题栏中的可见标题文本属性。The visible title text in a control's title bar is set by the property. 如果未提供控件的标题的 Web 部件控件集自动计算要使用的标题的默认字符串。If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此外，就可以提供默认副标题追加到标题字符串。Also, it is possible to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the title string. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For details, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码类概述。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现用户控件属性。The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#4)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式设置的值的用户控件中的方法当用户从单选按钮的页上，选择相应的属性名称的属性中的文本框中，设置新值和然后单击**更新**按钮。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#9)] 代码示例的第三部分显示了用户如何控制实现中引用接口控件，以及如何在控件上以声明方式设置属性。The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the interface is referenced in a control, and how the property is set declaratively on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountuchostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountuchostvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TitleIconImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TitleIconImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的 URL，该图像用于在控件自身的标题栏中表示 Web 部件控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a Web Parts control in the control's own title bar.

value.span: 表示图像的 URL 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够将与图标关联控件。The property provides a way to associate an icon with a control. 控件的标题栏中显示图标。The icon appears in the control's own title bar. 为了确保主题保持一致，应用程序开发人员可能想要使此图标类似于表示 Web 部件控件目录中的控件的图像 (中引用的映像属性)。For thematic consistency, application developers might want to make this icon similar to the image that represents the control in a catalog of Web Parts controls (the image referenced in the property). 在 Web 部件控件集，实现属性可以由最终用户能够更改控件的标题栏中显示的图标的图像进行个性化处理。As it is implemented in the Web Parts control set, the property can be personalized by end users to change the image or icon that appears in a control's title bar. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码类概述。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现用户控件属性。The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式设置的值的用户控件中的方法当用户从单选按钮的页上，选择相应的属性名称的属性中的文本框中，设置新值和然后单击**更新**按钮。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#9)] 代码示例的第三部分显示了用户如何控制实现中引用接口控件，以及如何在控件上以声明方式设置属性。The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the interface is referenced in a control, and how the property is set declaratively on the control. 请注意，是否未提供实际图像的 URL，该图标的占位符会出现在标题栏中。Note that if you do not provide the URL to a real image, a placeholder for the icon appears in the title bar. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountuchostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountuchostvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TitleUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TitleUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置有关 控件补充信息的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示有关 控件更多信息的 URL。

span.span: A string that represents a URL to more information about a control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在分配到的 URL属性，该控件的标题将成为一个链接。When you assign a URL to the property, the title of the control becomes a link. 此属性的用途是提供最终用户可以访问有关控件的其他信息的简便方法。The purpose of this property is to provide a convenient way for end users to access additional information about a control. 其他信息可以提供版权数据、 联系人数据，有关该控件的创建者或控件的用途的摘要详细信息。The additional information could provide copyright data, contact data, details about the creator of the control, or a summary of the control's purpose. > [!NOTE] > 通常情况下，不会使用属性链接到帮助内容。Normally, you would not use the property to link to Help content. 帮助提供的链接控件是使用的最佳方式属性。The best way to provide a link to Help for a control is to use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码类概述。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现用户控件属性。The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#7)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式设置的值的用户控件中的方法当用户从单选按钮的页上，选择相应的属性名称的属性中的文本框中，设置新值和然后单击**更新**按钮。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountusercontrolcs.ascx#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountusercontrolvb.ascx#9)] 代码示例的第三部分显示了用户如何控制实现中引用接口控件，以及如何在控件上以声明方式设置属性。The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the interface is referenced in a control, and how the property is set declaratively on the control. 请注意，是否您不提供指向实际页面的 URL，然后用户单击标题栏中的链接，就会出现一条错误消息。Note that if you do not provide a URL to a real page, and then a user clicks the link in the title bar, an error message appears. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/CS/accountuchostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPart_Overview/VB/accountuchostvb.aspx#1)]
